title: MovieHub
description: This project is a user-friendly movie application that leverages the TMDB movie database API. It allows users to browse, search, and view movie listings effortlessly. The application automatically updates its data to ensure users have access to the latest movies and shows.

title: ChatGPT Clone (using MERN stack)

title: Event Management Website
description: Developed event management website where users can book tickets for event and host can create event and manage bookings.
